title: Late 70ies Movie Title: Saint Jack
content:
Dear people,

i’m looking for the typeface used in the credits of the movie "Saint Jack", directed by Peter Bogdanovich.  
Does anyone know it or something that comes close in shape?

Thank you very much,  
HAN

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bildschirmfoto 2013-04-11 um 19.40.44.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011165943/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202013-04-11%20um%2019.40.44.png) | 615.98 KB |
| [Bildschirmfoto 2013-04-11 um 19.49.24.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011165943/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202013-04-11%20um%2019.49.24.png) | 157.41 KB |
author: howaboutnever

comments.content:
It’s an old BB&S typeface called Pekin…  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/pekin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011165943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/pekin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/pekin/")
